# Combine variables
___

## **left_join**: Join matching values from y to x

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/left_join.png")
```

## **right_join**: Join matching values from x to y

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/right_join.png")
```

## **inner_join**: Join data. Retain only rows with matches

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/inner_join.png")
```

## **full_join**: Join data. Retain all values, all rows

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/full_join.png")
```

# Combine cases
___

## **bind_rows**: Returns tables one on top of the other as a single table.

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/bind_rows.png")
```

## **union**: Rows that appear in x or y

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/union.png")
```

## **intersect**: Rows that appear in both x and y.

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/intersect.png")
```

## **setdiff**: Rows that appear in x but not y

```{r echo = FALSE}
include_graphics("img/setdiff.png")
```
